description.english: Finished the game.
description.french: A terminé le jeu.
description.italian: Ho completato il gioco.
description.spanish: Has terminado el juego.

description.english: Incurred deadly wrath of spider.
description.french: A subi la fureur mortelle d'une araignée.
description.italian: Sono incorso nell'ira funesta di un ragno.
description.spanish: La araña te ha matado.

description.english: Squashed the spider - now it's just yellow goo.
description.german: Die Spinne ist nur noch gelber Matsch
description.french: A écrasé l'araignée dans une flaque jaunâtre.
description.italian: Ho schiacciato il ragno, che ora è ridotto a una poltiglia giallastra.
description.spanish: Has aplastado a la araña. Ahora es una sustancia amarilla.

description.english: Bravely escaped from a burning room.
description.german: Mutig aus einem brennenden Raum entkommen
description.french: S'est bravement échappé d'une pièce en flammes.
description.italian: Sono fuggito da una stanza in fiamme.
description.spanish: Has escapado de la habitación en llamas.

description.english: Used guile and cunning to steal a gendarme's flask of absinth.
description.german: Einem Gendarm mit List und Tücke ein Fläschchen Absinth gemopst
description.french: A rusé comme un chef pour voler de l'absinthe à un gendarme.
description.italian: Con ingegno e astuzia ho sottratto una fiaschetta di assenzio a un gendarme.
description.spanish: Has robado la petaca de absenta del gendarme con astucia y temple.

description.english: Dunked a pesky dog.
description.french: A mouillé un chien méchant.
description.italian: Ho fatto finire a mollo un cane fastidioso.
description.spanish: Has mojado a un perro molesto.

description.english: Killed by Pablo.
description.french: A brutalement péri de la main de Pablo.
description.italian: Ho perso la vita brutalmente, per mano di Pablo.
description.spanish: Pablo te ha asesinado despiadadamente.

description.english: Knocked Pablo into the dock with a low flying barrel.
description.german: Pablo mit einem Fass ins Wasser gekegelt
description.french: A assommé Pablo avec un tonneau.
description.italian: Al porto ho messo fuori gioco Pablo colpendolo con un barile.
description.spanish: Has tirado a Pablo al muelle con un barril volador.

description.english: Found and rescued Nico in the warehouse.
description.french: A trouvé et sauvé Nico dans l'entrepôt.
description.italian: Ho trovato Nico al deposito e l'ho salvata.
description.spanish: Has encontrado a Nico en el almacén y la has rescatado.

description.english: Got the ancient Mayan Coyote stone from Lobineau.
description.german: Von Lobineau Kojotenstein der Maya erhalten
description.french: A récupéré la pierre du Coyote de Lobineau.
description.italian: Ho ottenuto l'antica Pietra del Coyote maya da Lobineau.
description.spanish: Has obtenido la antigua Piedra Coyote maya de Lobineau.

description.english: Met a talking goat. No, really.
description.french: A rencontré une chèvre qui parle. Si, si !
description.italian: Ho incontrato una capra parlante. No, davvero.
description.spanish: Has conocido a una cabra que habla.

description.english: Crashed the general's computer! Oops.
description.french: A écrabouillé l'ordinateur du général ! Oups…
description.italian: Ho mandato in crash il computer del Generale! Oops.
description.spanish: ¡Has bloqueado el ordenador del General!

description.english: Escaped from Quaramonte jail.
description.french: S'est évadé de la prison de Quaramonte.
description.italian: Sono evaso dalla prigione di Quaramonte.
description.spanish: Has escapado de la cárcel de Quaramonte.

description.english: Used a secret root to save Nico's life.
description.german: Mit einer Arzneiwurzel Nicos Leben gerettet
description.french: A utilisé une racine secrète pour sauver Nico.
description.italian: Con una radice segreta ho salvato la vita di Nico.
description.spanish: Has usado una raíz secreta para salvar la vida a Nico.

description.english: Shown a worm to a cat.
description.german: Wurm und Katze miteinander bekannt gemacht ... keine Ahnung, warum
description.french: A montré un ver à un chat. Allez savoir pourquoi…
description.italian: Ho mostrato un verme a un gatto... non so bene perché.
description.spanish: Le has enseñado un gusano a un gato. Ni idea para qué.

description.english: Solved an ancient puzzle which points me to Ketch Island.
description.german: Altes Rätsel gelöst, das mich auf Ketchs Insel führt
description.french: A résolu une énigme menant au Domaine Ketch.
description.italian: Ho risolto un antico enigma che mi ha indirizzato verso l'isola di Ketch.
description.spanish: Has resuelto un puzle que te lleva a la Isla de Ketch.

description.english: Found my lucky coal after firing it across sea - that was lucky!
description.german: Ich hab meine Glückskohle gefunden ... was für ein Glück!
description.french: A trouvé son morceau de charbon porte-bonheur.
description.italian: Ho ritrovato il mio carbone portafortuna dopo averlo scagliato in mare. Che fortuna!
description.spanish: Has encontrado el carbón de la suerte después de lanzarlo al mar.

description.english: Dodged a wild boar on Ketch Island.
description.german: Auf Ketchs Insel wildem Eber entkommen
description.french: A évité un sanglier sauvage sur l'île de Ketch.
description.italian: Ho evitato un cinghiale selvatico sull'isola di Ketch.
description.spanish: Has evitado al jabalí en la Isla de Ketch.

description.english: Made my way into a disused London Underground station.
description.french: Est arrivé dans une station abandonnée du métro londonien.
description.italian: Mi sono fatta strada in una stazione abbandonata della metropolitana di Londra.
description.spanish: Has estado en una estación abandonada del Metro de Londres.

description.english: Met Robert Foster from Beneath a Steel Sky.
description.german: Robert Foster aus Beneath a Steel Sky getroffen
description.french: A rencontré Robert Foster, de Beneath a Steel Sky.
description.italian: Ho incontrato Robert Foster di Beneath a Steel Sky.
description.spanish: Has conocido a Robert Foster de Beneath a Steel Sky.

description.english: Failed to sneak onto a boat, moored on the river Thames.
description.german: Nicht auf ein an der Themse vertäutes Boot geschlüpft
description.french: N'a pas réussi à monter sur le bateau amarré sur la Tamise.
description.italian: Non ce l'ho fatta a trovare riparo nell'imbarcazione ormeggiata sul Tamigi.
description.spanish: No has logrado colarte en la barca amarrada en el Támesis.

description.english: Got strangled by Karzac.
description.french: A péri étranglé par Karzac.
description.italian: Sono stata strangolata da Karzac.
description.spanish: Karzac te ha estrangulado.

description.english: Snatched the Jaguar stone from Oubier's corpse.
description.french: A pris la pierre du Jaguar sur le corps d'Oubier.
description.italian: Ho sottratto la Pietra del Giaguaro dal cadavere di Oubier.
description.spanish: Has cogido la Piedra Coyote del cadáver de Oubier.

description.english: Found the Eagle stone in Ketch's treasure chest.
description.french: A trouvé la pierre de l'Aigle dans le coffre au trésor de Ketch.
description.italian: Ho trovato la Pietra dell'Aquila nella cassa di Ketch.
description.spanish: Has encontrado la Piedra Águila en el arcón del tesoro de Ketch.

description.english: Rescued George from the sacrificial slab atop an ancient pyramid.
description.german: George vom Opferaltar einer alten Pyramide gerettet
description.french: A sauvé George de l'autel sacrificiel au sommet d'une ancienne pyramide.
description.italian: Salvataggio di George
description.spanish: Has rescatado a George de la piedra de los sacrificios en la pirámide.

description.english: Solved the giant wheel puzzle in the pyramid chamber.
description.french: A résolu l'énigme de la roue géante dans la salle de la pyramide.
description.italian: Ho risolto l'enigma della ruota gigantesca all'interno della piramide.
description.spanish: Has resuelto el puzle de las ruedas gigantes en la cámara de la pirámide.

description.english: Finished game without using any hints.
description.french: A terminé le jeu sans demander la moindre astuce.
description.italian: Ho completato il gioco senza usare alcun suggerimento.
description.spanish: Has terminado el juego sin usar pistas.
